patterns.name: Apache Version Detection (from table)
patterns._comment: Extracts Apache version from Server Configuration table (handles both 'Version:' and 'Version :')

patterns.name: Apache Version Detection (from Server Software)
patterns._comment: Extracts Apache version from inline Server Software string (older format)

patterns.name: PHP Version Detection (from table)
patterns._comment: Extracts PHP version from Server Configuration table (handles both 'Version:' and 'Version :')

patterns.name: PHP Version Detection (from Server Software)
patterns._comment: Extracts PHP version from inline Server Software string (older format)

patterns.name: Windows Detection (from Server Software)
patterns._comment: Detects Windows from Server Software string (Win32 or Win64)

patterns.name: Windows Detection (from inline string)
patterns._comment: Detects Windows from inline Apache version string (Win32 or Win64)

patterns.name: OpenSSL Version Detection (from Server Software)
patterns._comment: Extracts OpenSSL version from Server Software string (e.g., OpenSSL/1.1.1g)

patterns.name: OpenSSL Version Detection (from inline string)
patterns._comment: Extracts OpenSSL version from inline Apache version string (e.g., Apache/2.4.46 (Win64) OpenSSL/1.1.1g PHP/7.3.21)

patterns.name: MySQL Version Detection
patterns._comment: Extracts MySQL version from Server Configuration table (handles both 'Version:' and 'Version :')

patterns.name: MariaDB Version Detection
patterns._comment: Extracts MariaDB version from Server Configuration table (handles both 'Version:' and 'Version :')
